recipe.name: Air Fryer Chicken Taquitos
recipe.description: Air-fried taquitos are quick and easy to make at home and healthier than deep-fried store-bought ones.
recipe.author: By Yoly

recipe.name: Slow-Cooker Corned Beef and Cabbage
recipe.description: Slow cook your St. Patrick's Day corned beef dinner, and celebrate the easy way.
recipe.author: By LUSYRSGIRL

recipe.name: Biscuits and Gravy Casserole
recipe.description: Biscuits, eggs, gravy, sausage, and Cheddar cheese are baked together using this biscuits and gravy casserole recipe for the ultimate comfort food.
recipe.author: By Angela

recipe.name: Best Brownies
recipe.description: Cakey on the outside and fudgy in the middle, this easy brownie recipe really is the best! Done in an hour.
recipe.author: By Angie

recipe.name: Instant Pot® Shepherd's Pie
recipe.description: This family friendly shepherd's pie uses ground beef (instead of the traditional lamb) and your Instant Pot(R) or multi-cooker pressure cooker to prepare the filling and potatoes.
recipe.author: By fabeverydayblog

recipe.name: Fluffy Pancakes
recipe.description: Tall, fluffy pancakes make the best breakfast, especially when there's plenty of butter and syrup. Make it extra special with berries and whipped cream!
recipe.author: By kris

recipe.name: Grilled Apple and Swiss Cheese Sandwich
recipe.description: My mother taught me this recipe, and it has become one of my favorite quick meals. I find that Granny Smith apples work best, as well as a crunchy seed bread.
recipe.author: By Nikkiling

recipe.name: Easy Chicken Marsala
recipe.description: Chicken breasts are sauteed, then braised in Marsala wine and cream with mushrooms and green onion. Chicken Marsala simplified!
recipe.author: By sal

recipe.name: Chicken Parmesan
recipe.description: A classic Italian dish prepared with tomato sauce and mozzarella, with a few additions by Chef John. Sure to impress your friends and family!
recipe.author: By Chef John

recipe.name: Baja Pot Roast
recipe.description: This kicked-up Baja-inspired pot roast delivers an explosion of Southwestern flavor with every bite.
recipe.author: By Charlize Jamieson

recipe.name: Good Old Fashioned Pancakes
recipe.description: Make delicious, fluffy pancakes from scratch. This recipe uses 7 ingredients you probably already have.
recipe.author: By dakota kelly

recipe.name: Corned Beef and Cabbage I
recipe.description: This traditional Irish dish is the centerpiece for St. Patrick's Day. Corned beef and cabbage simmer with potatoes and carrots for a hearty dinner.
recipe.author: By Laria Tabul

recipe.name: Easy Meatloaf
recipe.description: This easy meatloaf recipe is one of our best--made over 7,000 times and never disappoints! This no-fail meatloaf makes 8 servings.
recipe.author: By Janet Caldwell

recipe.name: Crispy and Tender Baked Chicken Thighs
recipe.description: Seasoned with a simple spice blend, these delicious baked chicken thighs yield crispy yet tender, succulent results!
recipe.author: By Nicole Burdett

recipe.name: Stuffed Peppers My Way
recipe.description: Roasted green bell peppers are stuffed with feta cheese and a mixture of rice and green onions.
recipe.author: By Sandy

recipe.name: Better-Than-Olive Garden® Alfredo Sauce
recipe.description: Creamy and rich Alfredo sauce that some may say is better than the famous Italian restaurant chain is quick and easy to make.
recipe.author: By str0ngwarri0r

recipe.name: Lasagna Alfredo Roll Ups
recipe.description: Impress dinner guests with these picture-perfect portions of lasagna. Roll up cooked noodles with a spinach/ricotta filling and bake with a blanket of creamy rich Alfredo sauce.
recipe.author: By MARBALET

recipe.name: Easy Mexican Casserole
recipe.description: This Mexican casserole recipe made with layers of tortilla chips, beef, and salsa makes a quick and easy dish that will please the whole family.
recipe.author: By ANDREALF63

recipe.name: To Die For Blueberry Muffins
recipe.description: Extra big blueberry muffins are topped with a sugary-cinnamon crumb mixture in this souped-up blueberry muffin recipe.
recipe.author: By Colleen

recipe.name: Slow Cooker Chicken Stroganoff
recipe.description: Ultra creamy with cream cheese and cream soup, this crock pot dinner comes together quickly with the addition of chicken and Italian salad dressing mix.
recipe.author: By JUDI ANN
